messages.subject: GREAT article!
messages.msgSnippet: A good friend of mine from the NW recently put up her website. One of the articles there is SO awesome and has a lot to do with respect for children...anyway I
messages.messageBody:
A good friend of mine from the NW recently put up her website.
One of the articles there is SO awesome and has a lot to do with respect for
children...anyway I wanted to share it with all of you.
http://www.christinekrug.com/

She's a very special lady and someone I love dearly. An inspirational writer
and peaceful individual.
In the first paragraph of her website, it gives you a place to click for
reading recent magazine articles. If you go there, it's an opinion piece on
why you shouldn't read your children's journals.
Really cool. Read it!!

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
